text: Paliperidone is sold under the brand name, Invega and others, is an atypical antipsychotic. It is found in treatment of schizophrenia and schizoaffective disorder. It is made by Johnson & Johnson Innovative Medicine. == References == *[Chue P, Chue J (December 2012). "A review of paliperidone palmitate". title: Paliperidone
